search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" "action.cyences_notable_event_action"="1" | fields title

`cs_cyences_index` alert_name=$tkn_savedsearch|s$ | eval cyences_severity = case(cyences_severity=="critical", 5, cyences_severity=="high", 4, cyences_severity=="medium", 3, cyences_severity=="low", 2, cyences_severity=="info", 1) | search cyences_severity IN $tkn_severity$ | fields - _raw, search_name, alert_name, category, info_min_time, info_max_time, info_search_time, search_now, timestartpos, timeendpos, eventtype, linecount, splunk_server, splunk_server_group, tag, "tag::*", date_*, host, index, source, sourcetype | rename * AS X_*_NEW | foreach * [ eval newFieldName=replace("<<FIELD>>", "\s+", "_"), {newFieldName}='<<FIELD>>' ] | fields - "* *", newFieldName | foreach X_*_NEW [ eval <<MATCHSTR>>=<<FIELD>> ] | fields - X_*_NEW | rename orig_* as * | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time, alert_time)` | `cs_add_notable_event_editor_fields` | table notable_event_id, notable_event_selector, notable_event_edit, notable_event_quick_assign_to_me, notable_event_assignee, notable_event_status, alert_time, event_tim*, cyences_severity, * | rename notable_event_assignee as Assignee, notable_event_status as Status | fieldformat cyences_severity=case(cyences_severity==5, "critical", cyences_severity==4, "high", cyences_severity==3, "medium", cyences_severity==2, "low", cyences_severity==1, "info") | sort - cyences_severity

| rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" title=$tkn_savedsearch|s$ | rename title as savedsearch_name, "alert.severity" as severity, "dispatch.earliest_time" as earliest_time, "dispatch.latest_time" as latest_time, "eai:acl.app" as app | table savedsearch_name, description, severity, disabled, is_scheduled, earliest_time, latest_time, cron_schedule, next_scheduled_time
